text: Our forces saved the remnants of the Jewish people of Europe for a new life and a new hope in the reborn land of Israel. Along with all men of good will, I salute the young state and wish it well.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

text: Great occasions do not make heroes or cowards they simply unveil them to the eyes of men. Silently and imperceptibly, as we wake or sleep, we grow strong or weak and at last some crisis shows what we have become.
author: Brooke Foss Westcott

text: For evil to flourish, it only requires good men to do nothing.
author: Simon Wiesenthal

text: When a nation's young men are conservative, its funeral bell is already rung.
author: Henry Ward Beecher
